results.abstract: Chameleons or beauties, star turns or character roles — these are the performers who have outshone all others on the big screen in the last 20 years.

results.title: John Belushi in Focus: What a New Film Gets Right and What It Misses
results.abstract: After Bob Woodward’s “Wired” focused too much on the comic’s death, this documentary looks fondly at the star’s life. But his comic genius deserves more.

results.abstract: The announcement that “Wonder Woman 1984” will be released in theaters and on HBO Max on Christmas Day is the clearest sign that streaming is now central to the film industry’s business model.
